description: Wrapper developed by the Joint Photographic Experts Group (JPEG) for still images using JPEG 2000 extended encoding for digital still images, as well as other encodings.  JPX_FF images may be compatible with the JP2 reader specification (backwards compatible), thereby maximizing interoperability, or they may 'completely defined' by the extensions in Part 2 of the standard and thus not compatible with JP2 readers.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="formatCategory">still-image</field><field name="filenameExtension">jpf, jpx</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: ISO/IEC 15444-2:2004. Information technology -- JPEG 2000 image coding system: Extensions, Annex M: JPX extended file format syntax (formal name) JPEG 2000 jpf or jpx file format (common name)
